name: @react-monorepo/rrouter
description: Bulletproof react 18 SPA template with react router
author: Tri Rizeki Rifandani

scripts.dev: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true react-router dev
scripts.dev:claims: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true react-router dev
scripts.dev:destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true react-router dev
scripts.dev:claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true SW=true react-router dev
scripts.build: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:staging: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true npm run build-only:staging
scripts.build:reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-destroy: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true npm run build-only
